content:
Overfitting Aviodance

  • Reduced Cost Pruning

    • Adaption of Reduced Error Pruning (Quinlan, 1991)
    • Divide training data in learning (70%) and pruning (30%) sets

  • Clause Prefix Strategy

    • Add Prefixes of every clause to Pool of clauses for Reduced Cost Ordering
    • Last literals are least reliable in FOCL
    • Prefixes assure variables are bound before being used

    S1 :- trestbps > 140 & oldpeak < .4 & cp = ABNANG
    S1 :- trestbps > 140 & oldpeak < .4
    S1 :- trestbps > 140
